Citations.Cited_Guidance: Within a study design, if study type is Interventional then at least one intervention is expected to be referenced from a procedure.
Within a study design, if study type is Interventional then at least one intervention is expected to be referenced from a procedure.

rule.Check:
($.study.versions[$not("studyType" in $keys($)) or studyType.code = "C98388"])@$sv.
    ($sv.studyDesigns[$not("studyType" in $keys($)) or studyType.code = "C98388"])@$sd.
            {
                "id": $sd.id,
                "name": $sd.name,
                "studyType.code": $append($sv.studyType.code,$sd.studyType.code),
                "studyType.decode": $append($sv.studyType.decode,$sd.studyType.decode),
                "Referenced Study Interventions":
                    $count($sd.activities.definedProcedures[studyInterventionId in $append($sv.studyInterventions.id,$sd.studyInterventions.id)]),
                "dataset": $sd.instanceType
            }[`Referenced Study Interventions` < 1][]
rule.Description: Within a study design, if study type is Interventional then at least one intervention is expected to be referenced from a procedure.

Outcome.Message: The study type is Interventional but a study intervention is not referenced from any procedure.
